channel.title: Making a custom ring
channel.description:
can anyone help me with a ring that npcs cant attack you only on a certain island and you cant attack npcs so there is an island and you can pk there witch makes it harder to get the good drops the monsters drop please help
so basicallt i want it so npcs are non agressive(only when wereing the ring) and you cant attack npcs but this all only happens on a certain island
317 delta or pi i can convert most codes

item.title: Making a custom ring
item.dc:creator: @chromeblade0 chromeblade0
item.description:
@chromeblade0 wrote:

thanks for you help i kinda understand what you saying im sure you dont like spoon feeding but how would i right that ive never done voids etc etc on if elses by anychanse could you write the code fir me i will make sure to give 100% credit on the ring

Read full topic

item.title: Making a custom ring
item.dc:creator: @ravens ravens
item.description:
@ravens wrote:

just make a boolean to find if the player is on the island and wearing the ring. make a void that says if the boolean is true, and he tries to attack an npc it will send him a message saying he cant and he will not be able to. then add the void under “public void process”

Read full topic
